Classes/NetworkActivityIndicatorManager..name: shared
Classes/NetworkActivityIndicatorManager..abstract: The shared network activity indicator manager for the system.

Classes/NetworkActivityIndicatorManager..name: isEnabled
Classes/NetworkActivityIndicatorManager..abstract: A boolean value indicating whether the manager is enabled. Defaults to false.

Classes/NetworkActivityIndicatorManager..name: isNetworkActivityIndicatorVisible
Classes/NetworkActivityIndicatorManager..abstract: A boolean value indicating whether the network activity indicator is currently visible.

Classes/NetworkActivityIndicatorManager..name: networkActivityIndicatorVisibilityChanged
Classes/NetworkActivityIndicatorManager..abstract: A closure executed when the network activity indicator visibility changes.

Classes/NetworkActivityIndicatorManager..name: startDelay
Classes/NetworkActivityIndicatorManager..abstract: A time interval indicating the minimum duration of networking activity that should occur before the activity

Classes/NetworkActivityIndicatorManager..name: completionDelay
Classes/NetworkActivityIndicatorManager..abstract: A time interval indicating the duration of time that no networking activity should be observed before dismissing

Classes/NetworkActivityIndicatorManager..name: requestDidStart(requestID:)
Classes/NetworkActivityIndicatorManager..abstract: Adds the requestID as an active request driving the activity indicator.

Classes/NetworkActivityIndicatorManager..name: requestDidStop(requestID:)
Classes/NetworkActivityIndicatorManager..abstract: Removes the requestID from the set of active requests driving the activity indicator.

Classes/NetworkActivityIndicatorManager..name: NetworkActivityIndicatorManager
Classes/NetworkActivityIndicatorManager..abstract: The NetworkActivityIndicatorManager manages the state of the network activity indicator in the status bar. When
